thread.title: Suspect fatally shot after exchanging gunfire with cops | New York Post
thread.title_full: Suspect fatally shot after exchanging gunfire with cops | New York Post

author: Tina Moore
title: Suspect fatally shot after exchanging gunfire with cops | New York Post
text:
Cops shot and killed a man Thursday during a shootout in Brooklyn, sources said.
The suspect, who was being chased in East New York by a sergeant and two officers with an anti-crime team from the 75th Precinct, turned around and firing at them around 4:10 p.m, according to police sources.
The cops returned fire, fatally shooting him in a backyard at 890 Belmont Avenue following a two-block pursuit.
